sentences.en: According to the basic principle of game theory, it analyzes the share - expenses apportionment model.
sentences.cn: 首先,从对策论基本原理出发, 分析了费用分摊对策模型.

sentences.en: An apportionment of bandwidth between the graphics local memory and system memory is the result.
sentences.cn: 图形本地存储器与系统存储器之间的带宽的分配足其结果.

sentences.en: In this situation, the burden of proof as to apportionment is upon each defendant.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 按比例分配的举证责任就落在被告人身上.

sentences.en: Many experts also like to recommend such a low - cost method of apportionment.
sentences.cn: 很多专家也喜欢向大家推荐这种摊低成本的方法.

sentences.en: Source apportionment of airborne particulate matter is important in the field of environmental administration.
sentences.cn: 摘要大气颗粒物源解析技术在环境管理中发挥著越来越重要的作用.

sentences.en: Source apportionment of particulate matter is important in the field of environmental administration.
sentences.cn: 大气颗粒物源解析技术在环境管理中发挥着越来越重要的作用.

sentences.en: The Circular specifies the method for apportionment of taxable income among partners of partnerships.
sentences.cn: 通知规定了合伙企业合伙人间应纳税所得额划分的方法.

sentences.en: The development on the receptor modeling used to perform source apportionment of atmospheric particulates ambientwas introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了国内外用于大气颗粒物源解析研究的受体模型的进展情况.

sentences.en: The method of apportionment used will depend upon the documentation provided by the importer.
sentences.cn: 所使用的分摊方法将取决于进口商所提供的单证.

sentences.en: The process of sharing stock among stores. Formerly known as apportionment.
sentences.cn: 门店之间库存共享程序, 过去称为库存分配.
